Levin: Latest litter of puppies the last for Golden Retriever breeder Pat Munro https://www.nzherald.co.nz/horowhenua-chronicle/news/heart-stealing-puppies-signal-end-of-era-for-golden-retriever-breeder/53AZ2XRR3BCAPAZWQBD776FS5Q/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/horowhenua-chronicle/news/heart-stealing-puppies-signal-end-of-era-for-golden-retriever-breeder/53AZ2XRR3BCAPAZWQBD776FS5Q/ Paul WilliamsWell-known Levin breeder Pat Munro has kept one puppy for herself - a boy called Vino. Mon, 08 Apr 2024 05:00:00 +0000 Levin woman Pat Munro has built a fine reputation for her breed of Golden Retrievers over many years. This litter of puppies is her last.
